item.name: sign
item.description: An old, battered sign lies on the ground.

extra_description.description: Only some of the letters are legible :- _ _________| |_________ / | | \ / CAR.AX | | M.STY \ \ M..SI.N | | SW..P / \_________| |_________/ | |

item.name: tree opening
item.description: A colossal tree blocks the way westward.

extra_description.description: This enormous tree must be a thousand years old. Its rough bark looks grey and pale and is decorated with scratches and clawmarks. On its west side is a small opening just above ground level.
The opening is far too narrow for you to squeeze through but it looks as if the tree is hollow.

item.name: branch grey long
item.description: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

extra_description.description: It is quite heavy and looks as if it has been dropped from great height. It is long dead and very dry. Could probably be lighted quite easily.

item.name: branch grey long
item.description: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

extra_description.description: It is very heavy and looks as if it has been dropped from great height. It is long and straight and the wood is very hard, still being full of sap. Although it does not fit very well in your hand, it could be used as a clumsy but very heavy weapon.

item.name: branch grey long
item.description: A long, grey branch rests heavily on the ground.

extra_description.description: It is very heavy and looks as if it has been dropped from great height. It is somewhat twisted and the hard wood is still full of sap.

item.name: toadstool
item.description: A large toadstool grows nearby.

extra_description.description: It is a large, brown boletus that must weigh nearly five pounds. The top surface is covered in a thin layer of transparent slime that emits a weak, musty smell. Not the most delicious thing you have seen.

item.name: toadstool
item.description: A large toadstool grows nearby.

extra_description.description: It is a large, brown boletus that must weigh nearly five pounds. It has small white spots and the top surface is covered in a thin layer of transparent slime that emits a weak, musty smell. Not the most delicious thing you have seen.

item.name: coins gold
item.short_description: a big pile of gold coins
item.description: A big pile of gold coins is lying here.

item.name: potion blue
item.description: A blue potion has been left here.

extra_description.description: It has a nice deep blue color and a smell like peppermint.

item.name: potion yellow musky
item.description: A yellow potion has been left here.

extra_description.description: It has a deep yellow color and and a strong spicy smell.

item.name: shield round large
item.description: A large round shield has been left here.

extra_description.description: It is made from hard wood that has been reinforced with heavy iron bands.

item.name: crown iron
item.description: An iron crown rests on the ground.

extra_description.description: It is a heavy human-sized crown made from solid iron.

item.name: sceptre iron
item.description: An iron sceptre lies on the ground.

extra_description.description: It is a heavy sceptre made from solid iron.

item.name: ring iron
item.description: An iron ring has been left here.

extra_description.description: It is a quite heavy human-sized ring made from solid iron. It lacks decorations of any kind.

item.name: star morning-star
item.description: the morning star is here collecting dust while it lies on the ground.

item.name: shirt scale
item.description: A black dragon scale shirt has been left here.

extra_description.description: It is a sleeveless shirt made from big, black dragon scales joined with silver threads. Its inside has been made from the soft skin on the dragon's belly, making it very comfortable to wear. The word 'Isha' has been engraved on one of the scales.

item.name: skirt scale
item.description: A black dragon scale skirt has been left here.

extra_description.description: It is a short skirt made from big, black dragon scales joined with silver threads. Its inside has been made from the soft skin on the dragon's belly, making it very comfortable to wear. The word 'Isha' has been engraved on one of the scales.

item.name: cloak black
item.description: A large, hooded cloak, as dark as the night, has been left here.

extra_description.description: It is a heavy, black cloak with a large hood. The word 'Isha' is written inside it with a silver thread.

item.name: belt silver
item.description: A broad silver belt has been left here.

extra_description.description: It is a broad belt made from tiny silver rings woven together.

item.name: sword long slender
item.description: A long, slender sword lies on the ground.

extra_description.description: It is a long, slender sword that seems to be made from silver. The word 'Isha' has been engraved on the hilt.
